question.text: Why should you make sure that your indicators are cancelled after turning?

explanation.text: Leaving your indicators on could confuse other road users and may even lead to a crash. Be aware that if you haven’t taken a sharp turn your indicators may not self-cancel and you will need to turn them off manually.

answer.text: To avoid misleading other road users
To avoid dazzling other road users
To avoid damage to the indicator relay
